responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "1954F285496D903A45CDC4825EFD8404", "No one knows just how widespread the goblins tribes are or how they are allied amongst themselves. By aggravating them on their grounds, it may draw them out of their tunnels and into the open field where we can strike hard against them. The hope is that it will prevent them from attacking, while we build the momentum we need to sustain us from future assaults.")
name: MADD_0010_BBW_MableHellenport_48
